body.p: The default Jython implementation packaged with The Grinder is Jython 2.2. The Grinder 3.3 and later optionally support Jython 2.5. Jython 2.5.1 has also been tested and works fine.

section.title: How to use Jython 2.5
section.p: Download and install Jython 2.5. Add the path to the installation's jython.jar file to the start of the CLASSPATH you use for The Grinder agent processes. If you wish to use the library modules, you should also set the python.home property to point to the installation directory.
The support for Jython 2.5 uses the new instrumentation engine, and so requires that the agent processes are run using Java SE 6.
